about.title: Our Story
about.body:
“To rule the universe, you must first rule yourself. To rule yourself, you must be able to rule your own mind. To rule your mind, you must practice mindfulness and clear comprehension.” - Maha Ghosananda 

This is a reason for our small coffee shop. We found it on Friday 1st January, 2021. We envision that a cup of coffee that inspires a positive change in people and the community.
